mapper.insert: insert into comments(comment_id, post_id, member_id, member_name, comment_date, comment_content) values(comment_seq.nextval, #{post_id}, #{member_id}, #{member_name}, SYSDATE, #{comment_content})
mapper.update: update comments set comment_content = #{comment_content}, comment_date = SYSDATE where comment_id = #{comment_id}
mapper.select: select count(comment_id) from comments where post_id = #{post_id}
